Articles.Content:
Hi,

I have found a bug relating to the "schematic"/blueprint veiw in the craft editor. where the "blueprint" background doesnt appear and instead i get this:

https://photos.app.goo.gl/G9CQcciFJBtgErQQ6

(sorry, it's google photos)

This glitch is intermittent, sometimes I do get the right "Blueprint Background"

The log file can be found here:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1rhFdwMd4sLZwRseDXttHcyvAZxXVePfu?usp=sharing

My specs are:

Ryzen 5 5600x

Powercolor Fighter Radeon RX 6500 XT 4GB (The game runs smooth)

16 GB 3600Mhz RAM
